title: Introduction to Web Design
summary: Learn the fundamentals of web design, including layout principles, color theory, and user experience best practices. This session is perfect for beginners looking to build their first website.

title: Marketing Strategies
summary: Explore effective marketing techniques, including digital advertising, social media strategy, and content marketing. Gain insights from industry professionals to boost your brand's reach and engagement.

title: Pizza and Coding Bootcamp
summary: Combine your love for coding and pizza in this fun and interactive bootcamp. Learn the basics of programming while enjoying delicious slices, making coding a tasty experience!

title: Entrepreneurship 101
summary: Discover the fundamentals of starting and growing a successful business, from idea validation to marketing strategies and financial management.
